title: Mini-Ep 34: Clothing Care and Dry Shampoo
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 34: Clothing Care and Dry Shampoo
itunes:subtitle: On this week’s mini-episode Kate and Doree hear from a listener who can’t quite figure out dry shampoo, offer tips on how to care for not-quite-dirty clothes, and try to help a caller track down a vegan and cruelty-free mascara that doesn’t break the b...
description:
On this week’s mini-episode Kate and Doree hear from a listener who can’t quite figure out dry shampoo, offer tips on how to care for not-quite-dirty clothes, and try to help a caller track down a vegan and cruelty-free mascara that doesn’t break the bank. Plus: a follow-up to their earlier friendship convo!

To leave a voicemail for a future episode, call 781-591-0390. You can also email the show at forever35podcast@gmail.com. To learn more, visit forever35podcast.com.

This episode is sponsored by:

  • Fabletics: go to Fabletics.com/forever35 to get two pairs of leggings for $24.
  • Liquid IV: get 20% at Liquid-IV.com when you enter promo code FOREVER35 at checkout.


Theme music by Riot.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
